meanings.definition: A person or document providing background information on a topic.
meanings.sent1: The backgrounder explained the history of the conflict in simple terms.
meanings.sent2: I read the backgrounder to understand the context of the story.
meanings.sent3: The backgrounder made the dry facts surprisingly interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge was a backgrounder, painting a vivid picture of the past.
meanings.sent5: The backgrounder was like a treasure map to understanding the topic.

meanings.definition: A brief summary or overview of a situation or issue.
meanings.sent1: The backgrounder gave a quick overview of the main points.
meanings.sent2: I need a backgrounder to catch up on the latest news.
meanings.sent3: His backgrounder was so concise, it felt like a cheat sheet.
meanings.sent4: The backgrounder was a flashlight in the dark, illuminating the key details.
meanings.sent5: She handed me the backgrounder, a shortcut to understanding the situation.
